reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Promoting the capacity building of the implementing partner.

description.narrative: Many of the FELM?s partners in the Mekong region are in the process of shifting the leadership from foreign directors to the national ones. FELM supports this process by capacity building particularly to the leadership and organizational development. The p roject is implemented by a seconded Senior Advisor whose expertise is given for use of all the FELM development partners in the region. The project aims to strengthen the partners? capacity to be sufficient for the administrative and qualitative requiremen ts of development projects, as well as to professional management of the organization itself. The focus is in strengthening the capacity of the local directors and management in order to ensure the smooth shift of ownership in the organisations. The activi ties vary depending on the needs of each organization but include e.g. training and coaching especially for the senior management (board members, executive directors, management teams) and middle management (e.g. project managers). Also some training sessi ons for the whole staff are provided. The coaching is confidential in nature, thus the reporting of the results in details is left in the partner organization?s consideration. The beneficiaries of the project are first the directors and leaders and through them the whole staff and finally all the people and stakeholders for whom the organisations exist.
